text:
Created attachment 27464
Screensnap of my blog showing problem.

I can not post photos to either of my blogs at blogspot.com or view photos at my blogs and other blogs from blogspot.com
I use Firefox and this started when a forced upgrade to version 6 happened a few weeks ago. 
I was advised that it might be my Norton Internet Security Firewall but a support agent from Norton worked for about 4 hours trying every thing that Norton might be doing and also completely uninstalled Norton and the problem remained.
while I could not get back to an older version of Firefox he was able to revert it back to version 5 and the problem remained.
But on Explorer there is no problem. I do not like to use Explorer for any thing and especially when it comes to loading photos to the uploader for the blog I have to click on one photo at a time while with Firefox I can highlight 15 or 30 photos and then the uploader will take care of the rest.
When I look at my blog instead of seeing a photo all I see are small grey boxes
(see attachment) and I get a 404 alert. The only thing that changes in the alerts are the urls and full name of each photo. Here is an example of this.

Not Found

The requested URL /-IAjwgarbbe0/TmQv4JXtBPI/AAAAAAAAA_M/bjSozSOs0MA/s1600/destroyed_AFV+photos_7_1_45+%28Large%29.jpg was not found on this server.
Apache/2.2.9 (Debian) PHP/5.2.6-1+lenny9 with Suhosin-Patch Server at 1.bp.blogspot.com Port 80
creator: burntmoon_69@hotmail.com

text: Under your Product I inserted Apache httpd-2 but I do not know for sure if this is correct. Please excuse my ignorance but I know nothing that is technical or about coding. I am a retired disabled photographer with an interest in history and I am totally lost as to this issue.
creator: burntmoon_69@hotmail.com
